Author: grendel25
Title: [ANN] VARCRYPT PRESALE- blockchain distribution platform for VR and AR
Body: It is good to see a project with transparency about their team.  I don't mean that in a bad way against privacy projects where teams are left mysterious.  But just as many projects that shouldn't really be concerned with privacy have a tendency to be bad communicators and hide their team.  This project looks well organized and sensible.

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] VARCRYPT PRESALE- blockchain distribution platform for VR and AR
Body: Thanks very much for the feedback. We appreciate all comments , positive and negative and want, of course, to be as transparent as we can. There are a lot of things in progress at the moment which we will announce as soon as they are firm and not just hopes. We do have a team with a lot of commercial experience in the area we are looking to use blockchain to both make efficiencies and ensure a more equitable distribution of the fees that end consumers pay.  We will make sure we keep the community informed on progress both on the commercial arrangements we get in place as well as the tech and dev side  thanks for your support

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] VARCRYPT PRESALE- blockchain distribution platform for VR and AR
Body: What is VARCRYPT ?  MISSION  VARcrypt is the world's first blockchain specific hardware agnostic platform designed specifically for VR (Virtual Reality), AR (Augmented Reality), legacy content (film, television, music, print, video games) and software applications.  VARcrypt derives its name from a combination of both VR and AR resulting in the combination of VAR which when integrated with a cryptographic blockchain content distribution, rendering, and Payment processing protocol; creates VARcrypt. In addition to VR and AR content distribution VARcrypt will distribute legacy film, television, music, software, print, and gaming content via its blockchain with the specific aim to protect artists and content creators and ensure that they can enjoy the lowest cost content distribution possible so they can keep the majority of the profits generated from their  work.  The future of immersive content and software will not be either VR or AR, it will be VAR.  ABOUT US  VARcrypt will be powered by its very own token, VARcoin (VAR). VARcoin will enable users to publish and view content on VARcrypt for global distribution of VR, AR, film, television, music, sports, print, video games, software, & real estate into a combined blockchain powered ecosystem that will deliver a powerful experience.  We believe that the future of the Internet will be about experiences. Immersive experiences bring people together, inspire new ways of thinking and when virtual reality, augmented reality and Blockchain technologies are combined into a new technological ecosystem we believe that technology will be the future of the internet. VAvRcrypt is creating a user-focused interface that enables the global distribution, encryption, and monetization of content that is fair and transparent that simply does not exist currently.  Each new media format to emerge has represented a step forward in immersion and presence. From immersive video to mixed reality, content is becoming indistinguishable from real life experiences. Through Blockchain technology this content can now be completely encrypted to protect content creators and owners, monetized in a more transparent and efficient manner (especially when one is familiar with the difficulties faced by content creators and owners who have had to collect from major television networks and Hollywood Film Studios), and distributed globally.  Content creators and owners no longer have to sell off content rights by territory but can go global immediately upon publishing their content on the VARcrypt Blockchain.  Since 1974 when the TCP/IP Internet network protocol was designed it has evolved into a technology that allows any computer to communicate and connect to any other computer globally, the Blockchain protocol is repeating the same process all over again but in an exponentially more powerful way. Where TCP/IP is a communications protocol, the Blockchain is a value-exchange, encryption, distribution and monetization protocol.  What we are passionate about is building an ecosystem, unlike anything that has ever been build before - a decentralized, streaming and downloading, hardware-agnostic, and independent platform for Immersive Media including VR, AR and Mixed Reality (MR). All this is being built around a user-friendly interface that will give the user Content Creation Tools (CCT) and the possibility of getting paid instantly in a transparent fashion.  Simply put this is the future of the internet.  VARCRYPT PLATFORM AND PLAYER  VARcrypt ’s main mission is to provide an elegantly simple hardware agnostic ecosystem where blockchain technology can be combined with VR, AR, and legacy content together for the benefit of artists and content creators.   VARcrypt as a company does not want to be beholding to any one hardware provider and desires to remain completely independent.  To achieve this VARcrypt will charge distribution fees for content distributed so it can remain independent and is working with best in class coders to develop and integrate VR and AR  seamlessly into the VARcrypt app and website ecosystem.  We believe that our user-focused interface, blockchain transparency, and hardware independence are strong advantages that other larger content and hardware companies will not be able to replicate and are currently not available anywhere else.  VARCRYPT ECOSYSTEM  VARcrypt users will be able to use VARcrypt's own token, VARcoin (VAR) to access a variety of VR, AR, film, television, music, and gaming content via the VARcrypt app and website. This is a front-end consumer-focused service and should at a glance echo “a YouTube for VR/AR/MR”. Content creators and artists will be able to upload content and determine the price at which their own content can be sampled, rented, or sold.  Content will be distributed via the VARcrypt blockchain via the VARcrypt website and Android & iOS apps via mobile and hardware devices such as Oculus Rift, HTC Vive and others. VARcoin will be the token that allows users to rent, buy or sample a diverse array of content in more cost-effective cryptocurrency token based micro-payments  VARCRYPT CONTENT CREATOR  The 1st of a variety of Content Creation Tools (CCT) that will be available in the VARcrypt ecosystem is a VARcrypt app for Android and iOS which enables its users to create simpler and more spontaneous VR and AR videos and content with their smartphones to be directly uploaded to VARcrypt.  One of the Content Creation Tools we are launching is a virtual reality app for iOS and Android aiming to make 360- degree videos as easy as Snapchat and we are exploring the possibility of linking this with a our very own VARcrypt lite wallet.  Our strategy is to heavily support and inspire the creative community by both proprietary tools diversifying content on VARcrypt.  MANAGEMENT TEAM  ETHAN GILMORE   https://www.linkedin.com/in/ethan-gilmore-679120a4/  ARMANDO SOTA https://www.linkedin.com/in/armando-soto-839402a2/   PAUL MEARS  https://www.linkedin.com/in/paul-mears-80224b4/  IHOR PIDRUCHNY  https://www.linkedin.com/in/ihorpidruchny/  ANDREW ZUBKO  DEWANG AGARWAL  ADVISORS  DUNCAN RANSOM  https://www.linkedin.com/in/pixels4ransom/  JOSE ESTEFANO   https://www.linkedin.com/in/jose-estefano-49537b13/  ERIC CHUNG  https://www.linkedin.com/in/ericwchung415/  OFFICIAL CHANNELS  Website  https://www.varcrypt.io/  Telegram  https://t.me/Varcrypt  Twitter  https://twitter.com/varcrypt  Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/VARcrypt-1674211662848492/?ref=br_rs  Github  https://github.com/VARcrypt/varcoin  Reddit https://www.reddit.com/domain/varcrypt.com/  Linkedin  https://www.linkedin.com/company/varcrypt/   TOKEN SALE  Presale starts 1pm GMT 11 January 2018, ends 1pm GMT 14 February 2018  1m Tokens @1 USD 1m Tokens @2 USD 3m Tokens @4 USD  General sale starts 15 Fabruary 2018, ends1pm GMT 19 March 2018  6m Tokens @5 USD  Soft cap 2m USD Hard cap 45m USD  SIGN UP https://www.varcrypt.io/private/sign-up#join  White Paper  https://daks2k3a4ib2z.cloudfront.net/599c50d5dd872300010e6d49/5a30b0c37b7a1700017b313d_5a270873ef39d40001cc9282_VARcrypt%20White%20Paper.pdf  Video https://youtu.be/e9Z5XPLXcRM  COIN PARAMETERS  VARcrypt will pay VARcrypt miners further for the traditional mining of the VARcrypt blockchain with VARcoins as well as enable VARcrypt users to pay other VARcrypt users with VARcoins for storage of encrypted information on user’s available hard drive space. VARcoin is a customized blockchain that is built upon a C++ Bitcoin protocol foundation with a set supply of 42 million VARcoins. VARcrypt will have both on and off chain capabilities and will be Lightning Network compatible. The amount of VARcoins that will be available for sale during the token sale is set at 11 million VARcoins. VARcoin has a set supply of 42 million VARcoins with 10 million coins held in strategic reserve and another 21 million set aside for the VARcoin mining pool.  Basic Parameters  Total Supply 42 Million  Coin type:  Proof of Work  Hashing Algorithm:   SHA256  Difficulty Retargeting Algorithm:  Kimoto Gravity Well  Block Size:  8 MB  Time Between Blocks (in seconds): 600 Seconds  PoW Parameters  Block Reward Type:  Simple  Block Reward for Finding a Block: 50 coins  Block Reward Halving Rate: Cut in half every 420,000 blocks  Premine (for Tokenization crowdsale event)  21,000,000 coins  Wallets  Wallet Software Windows, Mac  PRESS  CROWDFUNDING BREAKTHROUGH   http://www.dhsessions4.com/Thursday17Fl13.html  HOW VIRTUAL REALITY IS POISED TO BECOME THE NEXT BIG THING   http://www.hbsphilly.com/s/1738/cc/index2.aspx?sid=1738&gid=26pgid=52464&crid=0&calpgid=61&calcid=102235  BLOCKCHAIN-ENABLED CONVERGENCE (PAGES 21, 22, 31) https://gallery.mailchimp.com/65ae955d98e06dbd6fc737bf7/files/Blockchain_Enabled_Convergence.01.pdf  HOW VIRTUAL REALITY IS POISED TO BECOME THE NEXT IT THING   http://www.hbscny.org/s/1738/cc/index2.aspx?sid=1738&gid=4&pgid=48586&crid=0&calpgid=13&calcid=78389

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] VARCRYPT PRESALE- blockchain distribution platform for VR and AR
Body: thanks very much guys, we think we have a project that has a real use case and with a team that as well as having the technical background for the chain also have the business relationships to get both the content to us and also to drive the distribution channels that will make this a business with a real driver for the token. We are strong believers that there needs to be a actual real use case for the token and not using a token that makes no sense in the business model.  The range of skills in the team give us a range of experience that can help us push the project the right way from a roll out and also medium to long term very sustainable business and token economy.

Author: monacogooner
Title: [ANN] VARCRYPT PRESALE- blockchain distribution platform for VR and AR
Body: We are well aware of that and dpn't intend to get caught up at that level  Hers a bit of what we have been talking about recently in Telegram  Armando Soto, [13.01.18 22:30] On VARcoin: Ethan held a lab workshop at Princeton University with some really bright minds on developing a proof of work algorithm that adds value to society.  Ethan and the participants of the lab arrived at the conclusion that we can change our proof of work GPU power to help solve science problems like protein folding and neuron slicing  All while keeping the network secure and helping advance science :33] So the current “energy waste” is turned to help humanity   [13.01.18 22:34] ah i see, whats varcoin's value proposition compared to other competitors  Armando Soto, [13.01.18 22:34] On the VARcrypt front we are currently working on bringing on an advisor that works at access industries (the company that owns Time Warner music) so we can start a discussion to bring their music catalogues to VARcrypts music channel  We are working on launching the VRplayer on the platform and getting VRcontent on the platform  Demar Derozan, [13.01.18 22:36] other forms of creative content blockchains are there, its somewhat of a semi-crowded space, but VR is a good place to explore  Armando Soto, [13.01.18 22:36] To enable media micro payments on a global scale  We want VARcoin to be adopted as the gold standard for media payments  Ethan has many relationships with producers. The plan is to get quality content on the platform  And independent content as well  Hollywood has had a monopoly on content for many years and it has started to crack in recent year  There will be an inflection point in the coming years  And we will be well positioned  To take advantage of that window of opportunity  Armando Soto, [13.01.18 22:42] We are focusing on India for emerging markets  Ethan has a close relationship with a very well knows cinema company developing content in India  , [13.01.18 22:44] great, also documentary crews, usually dont have any loyalties to any distribution channels and are ambitious  in terms of your workshop@Princeton, was there any interest from their end to pursue any long-term ventures  Armando Soto, [13.01.18 22:48] Quantum mining, using the processing power of the network for protein folding and neuron slicing. As the company develops we will pursue each vertical as it makes economic sense
